snippet: New books from inside and around the world of pop music, including the journalist Lisa Robinson’s memoir “There Goes Gravity.”
abstract: Howard Hampton reviews books There Goes Gravity: A Life in Rock and Roll by Lisa Robinson, Face the Music: A Life Exposed by Paul Stanley, Shining Star: Braving the Elements of Earth, Wind & Fire by Philip J Bailey, One Way Out: The Inside History of the Allman Brothers Band by Alan Paul, A Man Called Destruction: The Life and Music of Alex Chilton, From Box Tops to Big Star to Backdoor Man by Holly George-Warren and The Dylanologists: Adventures in the Land of Bob by David Kinney.
lead_paragraph: New books from inside and around the world of pop music, including the journalist Lisa Robinson’s memoir “There Goes Gravity.”

headline.seo: Lisa Robinson’s ‘There Goes Gravity,’ and More
